code: import React from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{AnimatePresence,motion}from'framer-motion';import Header from'./components/Header';import Login from'./pages/Login';import Questionnaire from'./pages/Questionnaire';import Results from'./pages/Results';import api from'./services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PageWrapper=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatePresence,{mode:"wait",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},exit:{opacity:0,y:-20},transition:{duration:0.4},className:"px-4 py-6",children:children},location.pathname)});};const App=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white dark:bg-black text-black dark:text-purple-500 min-h-screen font-sans relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark'),className:"absolute top-4 right-4 px-3 py-2 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded",children:"Toggle Dark Mode"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageWrapper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/questions",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageWrapper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Questionnaire,{api:api})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/results",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageWrapper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Results,{})})})]})]})});};export default App;
